

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_delim("Housing prices.csv", delim=";")

# rows with missing values
data %>% 
  filter(!complete.cases(.)) 
names(data)
# draw a scatter plot
ggplot(data, aes(x=`Percentage of Workforce Working Remotely`, 
                 y=`Average Urban Housing Price Index`,
                 col=Country)) + 
  geom_point() 

data |>
  pivot_longer(cols = c(`Percentage of Workforce Working Remotely`, `Average Urban Housing Price Index`), 
               names_to = "Variable", 
               values_to = "Value") |>
  group_by(Variable) |>
  mutate(Scale = scale(Value)) |>
  ungroup() |> 
ggplot(aes(x=Year, 
                 y=Scale,
                 col=Variable)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method="loess") +
  facet_wrap(~Country)

```
